bwwExcerpt: Their characters share a diffuse, off-center comic patter that promises to be much raunchier and offensive that it ever delivers. Jokes fly about the Holocaust, 9/11, O.J. Simpson's Bronco chase, and other crimes: "Gil's hair is like the JonBenet Ramsey case. The more you look into it, the more questions you have."
